duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage multiple equipment design, build, and installation projects.
Set and maintain project schedules and budgets to meet forecasted margins.
Coordinate internal and external resources for project execution, providing regular updates and working to contract milestones.
Function as the primary, external customer contact on assigned projects, focusing on exemplary customer service.
Manage the procurement of equipment and material to implement design basis requirements on various projects.
Evaluate Engineering Change Requests and Engineering Change Orders for technical accuracy and completeness.

education_certification.credential: Mechanical Engineering degree or related degree with significant experience in mechanical design. Bachelor's degree required (Master's preferred).
